text: Harold Crawshaw (18 February 1912 – 1971) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town, Nottingham Forest and Portsmouth. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1975 deaths Category:English footballers Category:English Football League players Category:Ashington A.F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Harold Crawshaw
